meanings.definition: A record of events in chronological order.
meanings.sent1: The annals of our family history are carefully preserved in an old journal.
meanings.sent2: The annals of the town's founding are kept in the local museum.
meanings.sent3: Reading through the annals of the past can sometimes feel like stepping back in time.
meanings.sent4: The annals of nature's cycles are written in the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: In the annals of literature, this novel stands out as a classic.

meanings.sent1: The annals of ancient civilizations provide valuable insights into the past.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study the annals of wars to understand their impact on societies.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes the annals of history reveal surprising secrets hidden in the past.
meanings.sent4: The annals of exploration are filled with tales of bravery and discovery.
meanings.sent5: The annals of art history showcase the evolution of creativity over time.
